Class GameListener

  • public class GameListener

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameListener(GameService gameService, RightclickManageService rightClickManageService, GameActionService gameActionService, GameExecutionService gameExecutionService, ConcurrencyService concurrencyService, BallForceFieldService forceFieldService)
      Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBallInteractEvent(BallInteractEvent event)
      Caches the last interacting entity with the ball.
      void onBallPostMoveEvent(BallPostMoveEvent event)
      Gets called when a ball move and calculates forcefield interactions.
      void onClickOnPlacedSign(NonExistentClass event)
      Handles clicking and joining on signs.
      void onPlayerClickInventoryEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when the player interacts with his inventory and cancels it.
      void onPlayerDamageEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Cancels all fall damage in the games.
      void onPlayerDeathEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Player Death event.
      void onPlayerDropItemEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when a player drops his item and cancels the action.
      void onPlayerHungerEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when the foodLevel changes and cancels it if the player is inside of a game.
      void onPlayerOpenInventoryEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when a player opens his inventory and cancels the action.
      void onPlayerQuitEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when a player leaves the server and the game.
      void onPlayerRespawnEvent(NonExistentClass event)
      Gets called when a player dies by strange occasions which are not handled by the EntityDamageEvent.
